2B25FBB4.3_instruction: While mounted, press {hotkey:Evade} for a {c_highlight}burst of speed{/c} to pass through enemies.

3D08DF31.0_instruction: Mounts can be purchased from a Stable Master or discovered throughout Sanctuary. Once acquired, each mount will be available to all characters on your account.

7A850535.4_instruction: Your mount can get scared around too many monsters. If the bar fills completely you'll be {c_highlight}knocked off{/c}.

8C67E8B2.1_instruction: Once you have acquired a mount, you can call it by pressing {hotkey:Mount}.

D8D1EF17.3_instruction_controller: While mounted, press {icon:r2, 2} for a {c_highlight}burst of speed{/c} to pass through enemies.

DBC6F233.2_instruction: You can select your summoned mount and customize its equipment at the Stable Master {icon:Marker_Vendor_Stable, 2}.
